title: Need 25 RP for a Key

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey, I was wondering if i could get 25 RP so i could get a key. currently stuck at 100 RP with nothing to do with it :(
Drew a picture of Braum if it helps.

replies.body: You know account sharing is against ToS and bannable right? You should never play on someone elses account normals or ranked

I wont play on his account anymore, but if he just borrow my computer because his sucks? (HE actually does that everytimes Im away) is that bannable O....O?

If so... thats scary :'c
WOW THAT PICTURE IS THE BEST PICTURE IN THE WORLD!!! WHO DREW IT ;)
Hey, maybe we can work something out!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can find some options!
